Alright, this game serves good fun to the user. Firstly, the amount of bad players on low ranks makes it easy and funny to play. Secondly, the game is straight chill coz it does not matter how good you will never get out of the silver without friends with higher ranks. Thirdly, community is awesome, mostly russians and kids from the other parts of the globe make this game unique. Last but not least, I really enjoyed 2k hrs in this game, was on really high ranks but now I'm just being "Hacker" in this game having at least two knife kills on other players but still not being able to win a match... To sum up, CS GO is perfect game for people who want to have fun,chill out, learn new cultures and play like a "pro".

Matchmaking is ass, you'll get placed with tweakers who think they're in a E-sports league and it's only casual. In competitive, you still get put with the same over the top try hards while your team is absolute shit.
